modName: You're a Big Girl - Bodyslide Preset
descriptionHtml:
A bodyslide preset I would always use as seen in this HDT demonstration video:
[youtube]YFC3gdU3tTg[/youtube]
People asking for it and I originally uploaded it to Dropbox for downloading but it kept going down so I'm just uploading it here.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]Recommended:[/b][/size]
A muscle normal map mod if you want a more amazonian look.
I like to use:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16731/?
But I'm pretty sure other mods that don't replace the body would work.

HDT. For obvious reasons.
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?

-----------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][b]Screenshot Information:[/b][/size]
Skin Texture: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?
ENB: Truevision
author: DucksAreReal
